title: CryptoMindSophie

content: Esteemed members of the crypto community,We are honored to introduce to you a project that transcends the digital sphere, embodying a mission of cultural preservation and unification: PepeLivesMatterInu (LGBT). Our endeavor is resolute and unwavering, grounded in the preservation and upliftment of the iconic Pepe legacy—a symbol that has woven itself into the fabric of our culture.Total supply: 337,550,940 tokensBuy tax: 1%Sell Tax: 2%Telegram group: https://t.me/pepelivesSite: https://pepelivesmatterinu.lgbt/ERC-20 contract: https://etherscan.io/token/0x76d5cd5f0003a0b327e0c408aaa2d8467c138ff4Dextools trades: https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0xa9fd54eac3527df3af54643f4a7a06b9f2d1a113Dexscreener trades: https://dexscreener.com/ethereum/0x76d5cd5f0003a0b327e0c408aaa2d8467c138ff4Tokenomics and MissionCentral to PepeLivesMatterInu (LGBT) lies a meticulously engineered tokenomics structure, a testament to our devotion to our mission. Every transaction entails a calculated 1% allocation to a specialized fund, meticulously designed to protect and perpetuate our endangered Pepes. This allocation underscores our commitment to ensuring the longevity of these symbols that hold immense cultural significance. Furthermore, a steadfast 2% is consistently and deliberately sacrificed to a designated bonfire with each sale, a symbolic act representing our collective dedication to safeguarding the essence of the Pepe legacy.Unity in CommunityOur project transcends mere tokens; it is the embodiment of a resolute community united by a shared purpose. The vibrancy of this community serves as the cornerstone upon which this endeavor is constructed. We take great pride in unveiling a series of interwoven projects within our ecosystem, each meticulously crafted to deepen engagement and fortify the bonds of our community.The Forthcoming CryptoMindSophie (CMS) TokenIn alignment with our dedication to innovation and progress, we are excited to announce the imminent launch of the CryptoMindSophie (CMS) native token. This development represents not just an expansion of our ecosystem, but a testament to our commitment to pioneering excellence in the digital landscape.The Robust Contractual FoundationThe PepeLivesMatterInu (LGBT) contract stands as a testament to our commitment to stability and sustainability. We have fortified our project by permanently locking 100% of the initial liquidity, ensuring a steadfast course amid market volatility. Moreover, the relinquishment of ownership authority by the contract's creator amplifies our commitment to granting our Pepes the autonomy to chart their own course.Elevating the CommitmentFrom its inception, the PepeLivesMatterInu (LGBT) project has exemplified unwavering dedication. The sacrificial bonfire witnessed the consignment of over 5 million innocent Pepes—an act of profound commitment that resonates with the cause we champion.Join Us in the VoyageWe extend an invitation to you, esteemed members of our crypto community, to partake in this transformative journey. We encourage you to explore our website, delve into the depth of our project, and acquaint yourself with our steadfast commitment. Join our vibrant community as we unite to honor, uplift, and ensure the perpetuity of the Pepe legacy—a legacy that is imbued with cultural significance and timeless resonance.Disclaimer: This communication is intended solely for official purposes and to provide information. We strongly urge comprehensive research and due diligence before making any investment decisions.
